scripts.start: npm install && concurrently --kill-others "node fileFetcher.js" "npm run watch-css"
scripts.build-css: node-sass --include-path scss scss/styles.scss css/styles.css && node-sass --include-path scss scss/theme/components/_header.scss css/theme/components/_header.css && node-sass --include-path scss scss/theme/components/_content.scss css/theme/components/_content.css && node-sass --include-path scss scss/theme/components/_greetings.scss css/theme/components/_greetings.css
